# Pull Request

## Description

Brief description of what this PR does and why.

## Type of Change

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Refactoring (no functional changes)
- [ ] Testing (adding or updating tests)
- [ ] Chore (maintenance, dependencies, etc.)

## Changes Made

- List the key changes made in this PR
- Include any architectural decisions
- Mention any new dependencies

## Related Issues

Closes #(issue_number)

## Testing Checklist

- [ ] Unit tests pass (`npm run test`)
- [ ] E2E tests pass (`npm run test:e2e`)
- [ ] Linting passes (`npm run lint`)
- [ ] Type checking passes (`npm run type-check`)
- [ ] Build succeeds (`npm run build`)
- [ ] Performance tests pass (if applicable)
- [ ] Accessibility tests pass (if applicable)

## Screenshots (if applicable)

Add screenshots or GIFs to demonstrate the changes

## Reviewer Notes

Any specific areas you'd like reviewers to focus on or questions you have.

## Deployment Notes

Any special considerations for deployment or environment setup.
